content:
As we work toward a pre-DevDays release of SUSHI 1.0.0, we'd like to get a sense of how many people have tried the SUSHI 1.0.0 Beta. If you have, could you please reply to this thread and indicate

  • if you tried it w/ an existing SUSHI project or a new SUSHI project
  • if you're aware of any show-stopping issues

Thanks!
+1 I've used it, 0 blocking issues for me
@Jose Costa Teixeira - did you test it with an existing (pre-1.0.0 project structure) project, a new project (from scratch), or both?
I had an existing project but moved the content manually to fit the new structure. In practice, I think this falls into the category "new project"

OK. For context, we're trying to get a sense for how many people have tested it on pre-1.0.0 structures as well, because once we release -- the Auto IG Builder will pick it up and many pre-1.0.0 projects will probably start getting built with it. So we want to be sure they don't break. We'll also be randomly selecting some projects in the wild and regression testing it against them.

I used it on my :

  1. Sandbox (convert from pre 1.0.0)
  2. Da Vinci CDEX
  3. US Core ( although mainly for the IG resource support for now )
